With sufficient materials, you may dispatch a fleet to a target star system to construct a new Nexus. It will be fully operational 30 days after the fleet arrives. You must have visited the system at least once.
You may only dispatch one fleet every 90 days.
The flow of vast datastores bring with them opportunity. No distance is too great to retrieve a perfect simulacra of vessels and armaments once uploaded.

A fleet of Remnant drones is guarding this object. They don't appear to recognize you yet.

They're currently engaged in an automatic defensive protocol, but you may transmit your IFF code to disengage it.

Your $shipOrFleet chirps out a request with your transponder code, with a request to stand down. Some moments later, the drone defenders process the information and plod away from the wreck in search of a new task.
